author: Dnevni List Danas
title: Ground News - Ministry of Labor: Announced a program competition to improve the positions of persons with disabilities.
text:
Summary by Dnevni List Danas A software competition to improve the position of people with disabilities in Serbia was launched today, and the deadline for registration is January 20, 2024, announced the Ministry of Labor, Employment, Veterans and Social Issues. Share menu More

A software competition to improve the position of people with disabilities in Serbia was launched today, and the deadline for registration is January 20, 2024, announced the Ministry of Labor, Employment, Veterans and Social Issues.
